entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
